text: Dong-A Law School is one of the professional graduate schools of Dong-A University, located in Busan, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the medium-sized schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 80 students. == Programs== Dong-A Law specializes on the international transactions law. == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Law schools in South Korea ko:동아대학교 법학전문대학원
title: Dong-A Law School
